texts: You received this PCN because this vehicle was seen driving in the Congestion Charging zone.
Select the main reason for making your representation from the list below. If an additional ground(s) applies, then reference them in the additional comments box.

Our response to your representation may be served using this email address. By challenging the PCN online, you are agreeing to this. Contact us if this email address changes and make sure our emails arenâ€™t blocked.
Read the London Road User Charging privacy notice .
You have not uploaded any evidence to support your representation. If you are unable to submit your evidence at this time, you can mail it to us at:
Enter the details of either the new or the previous keeper, if known.
The registered keeper is liable for the PCN even if someone else was driving the vehicle at the time of the contravention.
